title: Valga Keskstaadion
text: Valga Keskstaadion (Central stadium of Valga) is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in the town of <a href="Valga%2C%20Estonia">Valga</a>, <a href="Estonia">Estonia</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and hosts the matches of <a href="FC%20Valga">FC Valga Warrior</a>. The stadium holds 653 people and was opened in 1956.
